Description.enUS: Building a relay station can be built independently of the base, improving the construction efficiency of China

Tooltip.enUS: Recycle and destroy the unit or building (return 50% of the cost)
Select all SovietArtilleryFactory
Go to the tower defense construction page
Select all barracks
Go to the building construction page

An improved foundation building with Chinese characteristics based on the magnetic energy reactor in the Soviet Union, which can provide 10 population supply and is also a prerequisite for building more buildings
Repair the target building
Command the selected unit to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Units that are moving will not engage the enemy
Building barracks, training infantry, and working with multiple infantry units can greatly improve the effectiveness of infantry regiments
Dispatching mining trucks to collect minerals and obtain a continuous stream of financial income is also a prerequisite for building more buildings
This unsettling little thing can penetrate any non building target on the ground, directly killing light armored targets and causing sustained damage to other types of targets
Advanced tank factories from the china can produce the most powerful Army armor on land in modern times.
The second tank camp in Shenzhou uses magnetic rail weapon technology and secretly developed experimental grade heavy robots, which can greatly enhance the army's strength.
Radar can effectively detect a wide range of enemy threats, as well as reveal invisible enemies

Name.enUS: Build Large Fossil fuel power station

Tooltip.enUS: The large energy buildings in Shenzhou can provide a huge power supply and 50 people's supply, while also being a prerequisite for unlocking advanced technology.

This is the TechCenter in Divine Land，It provides all of research and upgrade

Role：Research
Select All AirPort
Go to the building construction page
Go to the tower defense construction page
Select all barracks
Select all SovietArtilleryFactory

This device would gather up the remaining energy of China and send large amounts of energy into space. These greetings from China would be received by orbiting prism satellites and refract to the target.

Role: The ultimate weapon

The derivative product of efficient anti missile interception developed by Shenzhou can launch a force field to block missiles in the area and make enemies in the area unable to use weapons or offensive skills

Dongfeng Express must achieve its mission! It can launch the Dongfeng-41 strategic nuclear missile loaded with hydrogen bomb warheads to carry out devastating strikes on target areas
Due to the Yu-Min configuration, the Dongfeng-41 has lower construction costs, takes up less resources, and is more powerful. Big, able to kill any enemy in the area with one hit

Character: Ultimate Weapon
Repair the target building
Select All AirPort

China’s basic defense building, which increases its damage and range by stationing infantry

Role: basic defense tower/combat bunker

Heavy fire-breathing tower, capable of burning all enemies with fire

Role: Close-range ground defense tower

A defensive turret using double-barreled high-speed cannons, which can deal with air and ground targets. When attacking air targets, it can accumulate bullet heat energy through continuous shooting, thereby increasing its power, up to 300% damage
Role: Ground/air defense turret

A powerful turret equipped with magnetic rail weapons that can severely damage enemies from a long distance.

Role: Advanced ground defense tower

Name.enUS: Construction of the Eagle Strike missile tower

Tooltip.enUS:
Using the land-based "Eagle Strike" missile vertical launch system, the guidance capability is sacrificed in order to maximize the loading speed, but the large-area destructive power in exchange is beyond the reach of other turrets

Role: Advanced Heavy Bombing

The Huntian Tower is China's advanced defense tower. The fusion energy it carries can cast powerful heat rays, causing strong burning to the target, increasing the damage the target receives and reducing its movement speed. It can attack up to 3 targets< n/>
Role: Experimental defense tower

An auxiliary building that can inspire friendly units through propaganda, giving them +1 range and +3 health recovery rate. It also paralyzes the enemy and reduces its attack speed by 50%
Characters: Auxiliary turret/can affect ground and air units
The range of influence can be increased by upgrading. Current range: 8code
Build buildings instantly
